clockcalendar2.question: If 6th March, 2005 is Monday, what was the day of the week on 6th March, 2004?

question.question: An accurate clock shows 8 o'clock in the morning. Through how may degrees will the hour hand rotate when the clock shows 2 o'clock in the afternoon?
